bench

Class MySQLJ

  • java.lang.Object
    • bench.MySQLJ

  • public class MySQLJ
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple driver to run SQL commands. Each line input from stdin is passed to a JDBC connection as a SQL statement.
    Author:
    dhentchel
